author: danielf
msg: Moving a simplified and reduced functionality version of o.a.c.core.CoreUtil from the blocks fw to a more appropriate place in cocoon-core. Compared to the original, it is split into separate Core setup and Logger setup parts. It use ServletContext instead of BootstrapEnvironment as input.
The move is done as a step in removing the dependency of cocoon-core from the core parts of the block fw.

author: schof
msg: attempt to fix mvn release:prepare problem

author: carnold
msg: LOGCXX-127: Main build.xml not referencing environment variables properly

author: cutting
msg: Add WritableFactory mechanism, to permit one to use ObjectWritable with non-public classes.  Register factories for DFS implementation classes and make them non-public.  This greatly simplifies the javadoc.
